name: Altium Designer PCB Project
summary: A PRJPCB file is a Printed Circuit Board ( PCB ) project file created by Altium Designer, a CAD application used by engineers to design PCBs. It contains a set of design documents, which include the layout of electrical components that are required for manufacturing a PCB. PRJPCB files also store project settings, such as output settings and schematic annotation settings.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
